name: Spussky
description: Spussky is about a little cat who desires to eat all of the spooky forest's candies. Unfortunately, the cat must pay a price for each piece collected. For each piece they carry, their movement gets sluggish and their speed gets slower. This wouldn't be a problem if no one was chasing them, however, let's say a lot of the spooky creatures in this spooky forest aren't very happy with the cat's actions. Your goal is to keep running and keep collecting!
